p: Analyses were performed in R using the dismo package to simulate species distributions ( R Development Core Team, 2013; Hijmans et al., 2015). We carried out SDMs following Elith et al. (2011). For each species, occurrence points were randomly partitioned into two subsets (calibration and validation, at a ratio of 4:1); this was repeated 100 times, each time choosing different random combinations of occurrence points for the calibration/validation datasets. Next, we calculated model parameters and used them to predict future distributions.
